Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory202.png'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Eek?! G-Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'How... how in the world did you manage to track me down here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Actually, your sneaky moves just made you stand out even more, you know?', 3: '10', 4: "You're not in disguise right now.", 5: '10'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Uh... next time, how about a heads-up before you sneak up on me like that...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Weren't you supposed to be out shopping with your squad? What brings you here...", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's with this impromptu visit?", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'J-just had a sudden itch to swing by.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You take a peek around Lamia's hangout spot. There is an inflatable pool, a kiddie slide, a stash of munchies, and a heap of sparklers."}
{2: 'So... are you throwing a party solo-style?', 3: '22', 4: 'Is this your "Fortress of Solitude" or something?', 5: '22'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'W-what gives?! Just to clear the air, all these things? Totally legit, no funny business involved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Took me ages to get this set up. Does it pass the test?', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory191.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory191.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lamia is like a kid showing off her sandcastle on the shore, dragging you over to take a peek.'}
{2: 'Is this your usual way to chillax?', 3: '33'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "There's nothing wrong with that, right... especially for your kind.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mermaid raises her gaze, peeking shyly at the person in front of her.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Have those problems... been sorted out?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you mean?', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "We're not going to... go through that again, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not anymore.'}
{3: 'She nods.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I want to say... thank you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why the thank-you?', 3: '47', 4: 'And why thank me?', 5: '49'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Because you're still here, having a peaceful chat with me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Complicated stuff tends to scramble my brain, but with you, it's like, what I see is what I get...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Whatever goes down, you'd handle it the same way, yeah?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia inches her hand toward you, then hesitates and pulls back.'}
{3: 'She grips that pair of hands, then raises her head.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'If there are any other problems, someone like you would sort them right away.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll take that as a good sign.", 3: '60', 4: 'Naturally.', 5: '60'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "So, what's the plan now? Hanging around here?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'If someone we know spots us... Wait, scratch that, not what I meant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I put in some serious effort to spruce this place up... Nah, scratch that...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "What I mean is, fancy sticking around? It's peaceful here, we could talk... you know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I-I-I might not always make sense, but...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I get it.'}
{2: 'You actually want me to join your "Fortress of Solitude"?', 3: '72'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "W-why not? I'm all about the open-door policy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Take your time. You're welcome to stay here for as long as you need... seriously.", 4: '1'}
